lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The private sector's frustration at the virtual standstill in bank lending overflowed at a businessmen's conference in the mountain resort in Abha last month and some powerful merchant families also called for change, bankers said.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Bankers in Saudi Arabia detect a fundamental shift in policy stemming from a need to tackle the underlying contradiction between an Islamic legal framework and western banking system.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: In addition, further moves are under way to align business life to the Gregorian calendar year, with companies being urged to adopt it as their financial year.
